Description.English:
shared_LuaUltimateHelpers_Serp: For Modders: 
 1) to save tables containing strings to the savegame for usage in lua (done by setting up/reading out the Name of a Nameable helper object) 
 2) Helper functions to find/loop through GameObjects. See lua script for info how to use. 3) Coop-Peer information 
 These were put into one mods, because they need each other to function properly.
